And it's like, be respectful

Keith?

I hate drama.

comments.text:
I don't understand how relationships like these can exist. I mean if your 
girlfriends only argue and talk crap behind your back (and then don't talk 
to you for a month), then they are not your true friends. When I get into 
arguments with my friends we try to fix things and apologize, not go behind 
each other's back and make the situation worse. Also, I hate when girls 
say: "This is why I don't have any girlfriends...all the drama." Although I 
know  there are dramatic girls out there, not all girls are like that. You 
just haven't found the right group of girlfriends.﻿
